VoiceCallListItem.name: VoiceCallListItem
VoiceCallListItem.description: Represents a single phone number in a prioritized call list.

CallListId.description: The ID of the related call list.

Ordinal.description: The order of the item in the overall call list.

RelatedRecordId.description: The ID of the related record.

State.description: Whether the call list item is not called, called, or skipped.
